===========================
sale order deliverable rate
===========================

.. !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

|badge1| |badge2| |badge3| |badge4| |badge5| 

This module adds a deliverable rate to a sale order.
The deliverable rate is use to know (in percentage)
how much of the order the stock can satisfy it.

**Table of contents**

.. contents::
   :local:

Configuration
=============

To use this module you have to create a sale.order and add an order_line.
Then you can see the deliverable_rate as a progress bar in the sale.order tree view.

Usage
=====

To use this module, you simply need to:

#. Create a new sale order.
#. Add a order line with a product.
#. An then see in the sale order tree the deliverable_rate.

Bug Tracker
===========

Bugs are tracked on `GitHub Issues <https://github.com/OCA/stock-logistics-workflow/issues>`_.
In case of trouble, please check there if your issue has already been reported.
If you spotted it first, help us smashing it by providing a detailed and welcomed
`feedback <https://github.com/OCA/stock-logistics-workflow/issues/new?body=module:%20sale_order_deliverable_rate%0Aversion:%2013.0%0A%0A**Steps%20to%20reproduce**%0A-%20...%0A%0A**Current%20behavior**%0A%0A**Expected%20behavior**>`_.
